problem_names:
lemma Resolution_complete':
  assumes fin: "finite S"
  assumes val: "S \<TTurnstile> F"
  shows "\<Union>((cnf \<circ> nnf) ` ({\<^bold>\<not>F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>"
translations:
lemma Resolution_complete':
  assumes fin: "finite S"
  assumes val: "S \<TTurnstile> F"
  shows "\<Union>((cnf \<circ> nnf) ` ({\<^bold>\<not>F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
from fin

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite S
obtain S' where S: "S = set_mset S'"

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>S'. S = set_mset S' \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using finite_set_mset_mset_set

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite S
  finite ?A \<Longrightarrow> set_mset (mset_set ?A) = ?A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>S'. S = set_mset S' \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  S = set_mset S'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
have cnf: "\<forall>F \<in> set_mset (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) (\<^bold>\<not> F, S')). is_cnf F"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>F\<in>#image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
                     (\<^bold>\<not> F, S').
       is_cnf F
by(simp add: cnf_form_of_is is_nnf_nnf)

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>F\<in>#image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
                   (\<^bold>\<not> F, S').
     is_cnf F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
note entailment_def[simp]

proof (state)
this:
  ?\<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> ?F \<equiv>
  \<forall>\<A>.
     (\<forall>G\<in>?\<Gamma>. \<A> \<Turnstile> G) \<longrightarrow>
     \<A> \<Turnstile> ?F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
from val

proof (chain)
picking this:
  S \<TTurnstile> F
have "S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not>(\<^bold>\<not>F)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  S \<TTurnstile> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (\<^bold>\<not> F)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (\<^bold>\<not> F)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
hence "S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not>(nnf (\<^bold>\<not>F))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (\<^bold>\<not> F)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F))
by (simp add: nnf_semantics)

proof (state)
this:
  S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
hence "S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not>(cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not>F)))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))
by (simp add: cnf_form_semantics[OF is_nnf_nnf])

proof (state)
this:
  S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
hence "set_mset (image_mset nnf S') \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not>(cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not>F)))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set_mset (image_mset nnf S') \<TTurnstile>
    \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))
using S

proof (prove)
using this:
  S \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))
  S = set_mset S'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set_mset (image_mset nnf S') \<TTurnstile>
    \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))
by (simp add: nnf_semantics)

proof (state)
this:
  set_mset (image_mset nnf S') \<TTurnstile>
  \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
hence "set_mset (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S') \<TTurnstile> \<^bold>\<not>(cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not>F)))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  set_mset (image_mset nnf S') \<TTurnstile>
  \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set_mset (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S') \<TTurnstile>
    \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))
by (simp add: cnf_form_semantics[OF is_nnf_nnf])

proof (state)
this:
  set_mset (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S') \<TTurnstile>
  \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
hence "image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S' \<Rightarrow> {#\<^bold>\<not>(cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not>F)))#}"

proof (prove)
using this:
  set_mset (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S') \<TTurnstile>
  \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S' \<Rightarrow>
    \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F))), {#}
unfolding SC_sound_complete sequent_intuitonistic_semantics

proof (prove)
using this:
  set_mset (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S') \<TTurnstile>
  \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set_mset (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S') \<TTurnstile>
    \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)))

proof (state)
this:
  image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) S' \<Rightarrow>
  \<^bold>\<not> (cnf_form_of (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F))), {#}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
hence "image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) (\<^bold>\<not>F, S') \<Rightarrow> {#}"
using NotR_inv
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) (\<^bold>\<not> F, S') \<Rightarrow>
  {#}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
hence "image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) (\<^bold>\<not>F, S') \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n"

proof (prove)
using this:
  image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) (\<^bold>\<not> F, S') \<Rightarrow>
  {#}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
     (\<^bold>\<not> F, S') \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n
by (simp add: SC_LSC is_nnf_nnf nnf_cnf_form)

proof (state)
this:
  image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
   (\<^bold>\<not> F, S') \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
with CSC_Resolution_pre

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n;
   \<forall>\<gamma>\<in>#?\<Gamma>. is_cnf \<gamma>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<Union> (cnf ` set_mset ?\<Gamma>) \<turnstile> \<box>
  image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
   (\<^bold>\<not> F, S') \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n
have "\<Union>(cnf ` set_mset (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf) (\<^bold>\<not> F, S'))) \<turnstile> \<box>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n;
   \<forall>\<gamma>\<in>#?\<Gamma>. is_cnf \<gamma>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<Union> (cnf ` set_mset ?\<Gamma>) \<turnstile> \<box>
  image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
   (\<^bold>\<not> F, S') \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     (cnf `
      set_mset
       (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
         (\<^bold>\<not> F, S'))) \<turnstile> \<box>
using cnf

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n;
   \<forall>\<gamma>\<in>#?\<Gamma>. is_cnf \<gamma>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<Union> (cnf ` set_mset ?\<Gamma>) \<turnstile> \<box>
  image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
   (\<^bold>\<not> F, S') \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>n
  \<forall>F\<in>#image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
                   (\<^bold>\<not> F, S').
     is_cnf F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     (cnf `
      set_mset
       (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
         (\<^bold>\<not> F, S'))) \<turnstile> \<box>

proof (state)
this:
  \<Union>
   (cnf `
    set_mset
     (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
       (\<^bold>\<not> F, S'))) \<turnstile> \<box>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Union>
   (cnf `
    set_mset
     (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
       (\<^bold>\<not> F, S'))) \<turnstile> \<box>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
using cnf_cnf[where 'a='a, OF is_nnf_nnf]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Union>
   (cnf `
    set_mset
     (image_mset (cnf_form_of \<circ> nnf)
       (\<^bold>\<not> F, S'))) \<turnstile> \<box>
  cnf (cnf_form_of (nnf ?F1)) = cnf (nnf ?F1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union>
     ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
      ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>
unfolding set_image_mset image_comp comp_def S

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<Union>x\<in>set_mset (\<^bold>\<not> F, S').
      cnf (cnf_form_of (nnf x))) \<turnstile> \<box>
  cnf (cnf_form_of (nnf ?F1)) = cnf (nnf ?F1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Union>x\<in>{\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> set_mset S'.
        cnf (nnf x)) \<turnstile> \<box>
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<Union>
   ((cnf \<circ> nnf) ` ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> S)) \<turnstile> \<box>

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

corollary Resolution_complete_single:
  assumes "\<Turnstile> F"
  shows "cnf (nnf (\<^bold>\<not>F)) \<turnstile> \<box>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cnf (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)) \<turnstile> \<box>
using assms Resolution_complete'[OF finite.emptyI, of F]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Turnstile> F
  {} \<TTurnstile> F \<Longrightarrow>
  \<Union>
   ((cnf \<circ> nnf) `
    ({\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> {})) \<turnstile> \<box>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cnf (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)) \<turnstile> \<box>
unfolding entailment_def comp_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Turnstile> F
  \<forall>\<A>.
     (\<forall>G\<in>{}. \<A> \<Turnstile> G) \<longrightarrow>
     \<A> \<Turnstile> F \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<Union>x\<in>{\<^bold>\<not> F} \<union> {}.
      cnf (nnf x)) \<turnstile> \<box>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cnf (nnf (\<^bold>\<not> F)) \<turnstile> \<box>
by simp

(* the interesting thing that I want to state with this lemma (although much weaker than Resolution_complete (yes, the one from the other file without the '))
   is that you can prove all these things relatively easily. You don't need complicated things like compactness or that CNF transformation.
   (I did not feel like separating "that CNF transformation" into different files, so you'll either have to believe me
    or stare at the used lemmas and simp sets, etc. very intensely. *)
end
